      • mapBillingPeriods

        protected void mapBillingPeriods(CisSubscriptionItem subItem,
                                 BillingPlanPeriod billingPlanPeriod)
        Maps billing period cycle lengths to Vindicia-compatible cycles. Currently offered/implemented cycles are "Month", "Year", "Quarter"
        Parameters:
        subItem - the subscriptionItem to map
        billingPlanPeriod - the target BillingPlanPeriod entry for Vindicia
